UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Penetratin and derivatives acting as antibacterial agents.
Literature.Author: Garro AD, Olivella MS, Bombasaro JA, Lima B, Tapia A, Feresin G, Perczel A, Somlai C, Penke B, Cascales JL, Rodríguez AM, Enriz RD

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>50µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=50µM),Escherichia coli(MIC=12.5µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>50µM),Yersinia enterocolitica(MIC=>50µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis(MIC=12.5µM),Salmonella sp.(MIC=25µM)
